member.name: KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES
member.summary: Flags that specify the current redirection capabilities of a known folder. Used by .

member.name: KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES.KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES_ALLOW_ALL
member.summary: The folder can be redirected if any of the bits in the lower byte of the value are set but no DENY flag is set. DENY flags are found in the upper byte of the value.

member.name: KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES.KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES_REDIRECTABLE
member.summary: The folder can be redirected. Currently, redirection exists for only common and user folders; fixed and virtual folders cannot be redirected.

member.name: KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES.KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES_DENY_POLICY_REDIRECTED
member.summary: The folder cannot be redirected because it is already redirected by group policy.

member.name: KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES.KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES_DENY_POLICY
member.summary: The folder cannot be redirected because the policy prohibits redirecting this folder.

member.name: KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES.KF_REDIRECTION_CAPABILITIES_DENY_PERMISSIONS
member.summary: The folder cannot be redirected because the calling application does not have sufficient permissions.
